page.title: 08My Day,Mark,age 10.N.Silton
page.content: I get up at quarter to eight in the morning,get dressed and go downstairs. I have toast and orange juice for my breakfast and leave for school at quarter to nine.I walk 0.5 Km.At ten to nine I reach school and sit under the big oak tree with my friends Edmund and Steven.Our teacher knocks on the window at nine o'clock and we go in to start work.We have a lesson from the bible,sing a hymn and say a prayer then start Mental Arithmetic and Scottish Primary Maths.We watch a television programme most mornings, these include Picture Box,A Place to Live,Science Workshop and Animals in Action.Picture Box is usually a film to stimulate creative work and A Place to Live is about animals,birds and insects and their environment.We have playtime at ten forty and come in at eleven to do more sums.
